title: Autonomous Systems and Active Inference
description: Application of Active Inference to autonomous systems including self-driving cars, drones, and robotic platforms.
learning_objectives: Design autonomous systems using Active Inference
Handle uncertainty in perception and control

content.overview: Autonomous systems must operate in complex, uncertain environments while ensuring safety and efficiency. Active Inference provides a framework for building autonomous systems that naturally handle uncertainty, learn from experience, and make decisions that balance multiple objectives.
